questions.question: What is the purpose of this application?
questions.answer: This application is designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently.

questions.question: How can I reset my password?
questions.answer: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and following the instructions.

questions.question: Is there a mobile version of the application?
questions.answer: Yes, our application is available on both iOS and Android platforms.
